price: Taj dan izloženi bit ćete i nijedna tajna vaša neće skrivena ostati.
arabic: يَوۡمَئِذٖ تُعۡرَضُونَ لَا تَخۡفَىٰ مِنكُمۡ خَافِيَةٞ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: yawma-idhin tuʿ'raḍūna lā takhfā minkum khāfiyatun
